legal_text: This website is for personal use and does not engage in any commercial activity, although you may see some personal, non-profit demonstration projects here. My commercial activities are outside the scope of this website, and if you'd like to learn more about them, you can contact me through the channel indicated.
cookies_text: The cookies that may be used on this page are of a technical nature and will not collect personal data under any circumstances.
privacy_text: The only data I may retain is the communication you have initiated with me via email, and it will be used solely to respond to your inquiry. Under no circumstances will it be shared with third parties without your explicit consent. By sending an email, you agree that your data may be processed to respond to your inquiry, and your data will be retained solely for the purpose of responding to you.
